remarks: Connectedness for a subspace.  See ~ connsub .  (Contributed by FL, 29-May-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)
statement:
consuba $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ A C_ X ) -> ( ( J |`t A ) e. Con <-> A. x e. J A. y e. J ( ( ( x i^i A ) =/= (/) /\ ( y i^i A ) =/= (/) /\ ( ( x i^i y ) i^i A ) = (/) ) -> ( ( x u. y ) i^i A ) =/= A ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d x y $.
